article_title: Charlotte hospitals offer interest-free payment plans
article_text: Charlotte-area hospitals are offering no-interest payment plans to help patients with higher insurance costs and medical bills. The changes come at a time when the number of uninsured Americans is declining, but those who have insurance are getting stuck with higher out-of-pocket costs.
